meanings.definition: Soilures: the act of soiling or staining
meanings.sent1: The soilures on his shirt were hard to remove.
meanings.sent2: She tried to clean the soilures on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The soilures on the wall made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The soilures of the past haunted his memories.
meanings.sent5: The soilures on the fabric were a reminder of the messy meal.

meanings.definition: Soilures: something that has been soiled or stained
meanings.sent1: The soilures on the tablecloth were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't stand the soilures on his favorite jacket.
meanings.sent3: The soilures on the book made it look well-loved.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation was clean, with no soilures to tarnish it.
meanings.sent5: The soilures on the glass were a testament to a fun party.
